[set page_title]Final Confirmation[/set] [set ui_checklist]1[/set] @_UI_STD_HEAD_@
Review the information you entered using the Catalog Wizard. Once you are satisfied with the settings of your site click Next. All required fields that have not been completed will be displayed in red.
